amendment.description: To provide additional duties for the DOD-VA Joint Executive Committee relating to integrated healing care practices for members of the Armed Forces and veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 815 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 815 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S6898; text: CR S6898) To provide additional duties for the DOD-VA Joint Executive Committee relating to integrated healing care practices for members of the Armed Forces and veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 815 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 815 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Mikulski.
